title: Optimize UI layout by moving breadcrumbs to header and removing duplicate titles
description: Refactor the @devlog/web UI layout to move breadcrumb elements into a consolidated header section and remove duplicate page titles. This will create a cleaner, more space-efficient layout where the breadcrumb serves as both navigation and page identification.

notes.content:
Completed the core layout optimization:
- Simplified NavigationBreadcrumb to just show breadcrumb navigation without duplicate titles
- Removed duplicate "All Devlogs" title from DevlogList component and streamlined the stats display
- Updated CSS styling to match the new simplified header structure
- Dashboard correctly hides breadcrumb since it doesn't need navigation context

The breadcrumb now serves purely as navigation, eliminating the visual redundancy.

Moved overview stats to the header actions area alongside the Create Devlog button:
- Stats are now calculated in DevlogListPage and passed to header actions with detailed variant
- Removed stats display from DevlogList component to eliminate redundancy
- Created a more compact layout with stats next to the action button
- Maintains the detailed stats view the user preferred while optimizing space utilization

The layout now has minimal empty space with stats positioned logically near the primary action.

Final refinements completed:
- Removed showBreadcrumb prop from PageLayout since breadcrumbs should always be shown for navigation
- Updated DashboardPage to show overview stats in header actions area (consistent with DevlogListPage)
- NavigationBreadcrumb now returns null for dashboard (/) since no breadcrumb navigation is needed on root page
- Eliminated useless title/subtitle display on dashboard as requested
- All pages now have consistent header behavior with breadcrumb navigation and actions area

The layout is now fully optimized with consistent patterns across all pages.

Completed cleanup of Dashboard component:
- Removed unused header section with duplicate title, subtitle, and OverviewStats display
- Cleaned up unused imports: OverviewStats, Paragraph, classNames, Tag
- Dashboard component now focuses purely on content: charts and recent devlogs
- All header information (stats, navigation) is now handled by PageLayout consistently

The optimization is now complete with no redundant elements remaining.

context.businessContext: Currently the UI has redundant information - breadcrumbs in the PageLayout header and separate titles in page components (like "All Devlogs" in DevlogList). This creates visual clutter and wastes vertical space. A unified header approach will improve user experience and make better use of screen real estate.
context.technicalContext: The current architecture uses PageLayout component for breadcrumbs and individual page components (DevlogList, DevlogDetails) render their own titles. Need to modify the header structure to incorporate page-specific information and remove title redundancy from page content areas.
acceptanceCriteria: Breadcrumbs moved to a unified header area for all pages
Duplicate page titles removed from component content areas
Header shows both navigation breadcrumb and relevant page actions
Visual hierarchy remains clear and accessible
